caption.p: Virus-specific mouse IgA antibodies against homologous viruses in QIV after challenge. Lungs and NTs were collected at 5 dpc; NW, BALFS, and sera were collected at 21 dpc. Shown are virus-specific IgA antibodies against Ca/04 (A), B/Bris (B), Ty/04 (C), and B/Wisc (D) by ELISA. Sample dilutions are shown on the x axes. P values using two-way ANOVA are indicated for IgA differences between vaccination-challenge groups and the PBS-PBS group. *, P < 0.05; **, P < 0.01; ***, P < 0.001; ****, P < 0.0001. The error bars indicate standard deviation. Values on the x axis correspond to dilutions of the original samples in PBS prior to testing.
